data.title: Early Round A Main Meddle
data.description: Here's an easy, but powerful way to contest for A Main control with a simple Meddle lineup.

data.title: Early Round Dish Meddle
data.description: Early into the round, coordinate a play with a teammate towards Dish to catch Attackers looking to take control of it.

data.title: B Main Aggressive Ruse
data.description: Set up an aggressive play towards B Main with this simple Ruse lineup, allowing your team to play a crossfire or setting up an unexpected angle underground.

data.title: Aggressive Arcade Ruse Play
data.description: Set up an aggressive play towards Arcade with this simple Ruse lineup, allowing your team to play a crossfire or setting up an unexpected angle underground.
